title: Critiques Needed - My new Sans Serif Typeface
content:
Hello,

I´m doing a new typeface for my final typography class, here´s an image with a sample... and i would like some critiques to keep going with my design.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225310im_/http:/typophile.com/files/screen-capture_5137.png)

Thanks
author: emanuelb

comments.content:
I'd definitely say keep going with this.

Looks like you haven't decided on a variable-width or constant-width style. The _c_, _s_, _o_ and the tails of the _g_ and _e_ are constant-width, and the rest are variable-width. I think the variable-width looks better.

The top of the vertical in _b_, _d_ and _h_, and the bottoms of the _p_ and _q_ seem like they should be flatter.
